About.Hours & facilities: Our Museum is open the first Sunday of each month from 2-4pm and each Monday morning from 10am to 12 noon or by request. We have reference assistance available by mail or in person. Copying services are available where there is no copyright infringement and we can copy to A3 size. We have a large collection of photographs which can be copied and have a photographer who can reproduce any photos brought in to him. We have local newspapers from 1882 (on microfilm until 1966 then bound in yearly editions.)

About.Access: The Archives Centre is open each Friday from 1-4pm or by appointment. Phone numbers as above.
